Author: quietlyinteresting
Text: Well as long as you’re not heavily restricting and not fasting. I will provide these tips and you promise to eat something healthy and safe.   Most of all do not use eating a little sweet as an excuse to BP. Your better than that. Its only probably at worse 150-200KCALs, Mouthful 20-50KCALs easily walked off    Don’t let the fear consume you, fuck the fear.     Jesus don’t drink caffeine that day that’s a heavy trigger with sugar.   Ok try and sell this….  Mention your tooth hurts.  You have an upset stomach.  You have a Migraine and something sweet will make it worse.  Chew minty gum just before dishing the sweet. Explain you have the taste of mint in your mouth.  You ate too much porridge for breakfast feel blotted or you ate too much at lunch.  Let everyone else eat step out when you come back break up the sweet on the plate. Like you have eaten it.
